text: has anyone ever heard of Ivanka
appearances like this during a
presidential visit to South Korea raise
a question exactly what is Ivanka
Trump's role in this White House Donald
Trump's administration has been filled
with an ever-changing cast of characters
but Ivanka Trump has been a constant a
face in the background at key Washington
meetings and sometimes much more at the
g20 summit in Japan Ivanka was front and
center chatting with foreign officials
and sitting next to the president for a
group photograph with world leaders her
presence prompted a firestorm of social
media mockery causing the White House to
defend her efforts and dismiss her
critics as haters Ivanka's official
title is senior advisor to the president
but as Donald Trump's daughter she's
much more than that
chapter she weren't my daughter would be
so much easier during the campaign
Ivanka was a regular surrogate for her
father in particular trying to attract
support from younger and female voters
since mr. Trump's inauguration of Vonk
has been given credit anonymously for
encouraging the president to launch
retaliatory strikes on Syria for its use
of chemical weapons and for curtailing
his policy of separating migrant
families at the us-mexico border her
concern about global warming however
hasn't deterred the president from
cutting environmental regulations and
withdrawing the u.s. from the Paris
climate Accord policies that allow women
with children to thrive should not be
novelties they should be the norm one of
her top priority issues an expanded paid
family leave program has failed to gain
traction Ivanka has also championed a
global Women's Business initiative
backed by 50 billion in USA dollars
she's traveled to Europe Africa and
India to promote these efforts it hasn't
always been a smooth road for her
however as she's been pressed to defend
her father's sometimes inflammatory
comments towards women while spouses and
siblings have often had influential
roles in modern u.s. presidential in
ministrations Ivanka Trump situation is
a unique aspect of a very unorthodox
presidency
